thread.title: Eurasia Drilling Co Moves to Become Private Company
thread.title_full: Eurasia Drilling Co Moves to Become Private Company - WSJ

author: Selina Williams
title: Eurasia Drilling Co Moves to Become Private Company
text:
LONDON—Russia’s largest onshore oil driller is moving to become a private company in another sign of the toll a prolonged price slump is taking on the oil-services industry.
Eurasia Drilling Co. said Thursday that unnamed managers and “core shareholders” had made an undisclosed offer to take the company private, as it faces a challenging Russian economy, uncertainty from the effects of Western sanctions and geopolitics, and oil...
